title: New: REID – Wake
body:
It’s been just under a year since we last checked in with Cork producer **REID** and from the sounds of new jam _Wake_, he’s really taken the time to enhance his sound.

Seemingly moving from the confines of his bedroom to a far more gig-orientated sound, it’s just dying to be played over the booming speakers at the slickest bar in town. With several of the original crop of early 10’s bedroom producers emerging from their bedrooms and into the live circuits, it’s a sound that certainly keeps pace with this transition.
